description: Allows multiple inputs of text or numeric type on the same page.

skip.description: DEPRECATED - please use `required` from the inputList below.

inputTypeForAll.description: Set input type for the entire list. This value can be overridden by individual inputs.

verticalSpacing.description: Vertical spacing between inputs, given in [px]

horizontalSpacing.description: DEPRECATED as of v1.0.0 - Horizontal spacing between buttons, given in [px]

review.description: Whether to allow the inputs to be reviewed without the input boxes.

items.description: Type of input, based on html input type: `text`, `number`, `dropdown`, `date`, and `multi-dropdown`.  If no input type is specified, the type will be set to `text`.  The value of `inputType` within each input will override `inputTypeForAll` above

options.description: Array of options used when the `inputType` is a dropdown

required.description: Determines if the page is submittable without a response for this input

exportToCSV.description: Whether result should be exported to CSV upon submitting exam results.

dateProperties.description: Optional properties for when the `inputType` is a date

maxDate.description: Maximum date allowed in ISO formatted string YYYY-MM-DD or 'today'

minDate.description: Minimum date allowed in ISO formatted string YYYY-MM-DD or 'today'
